name: Emma Pann
text: We had a blast at Pinspiration!!!  There are so many projects to choose from.  My hubby and I went on a date for our anniversary.  We loved the splatter room and the bar had great options.  My daughter and I then attended a Mommy, Me, & Muffins event where my daughter got to make a Mother's Day craft.  The staff is amazing!!!  Definitely a great place for a date, girl's night, or to just paint/craft!!

name: Monica Warren
text: Our family had an awesome time celebrating my daughter's birthday. We did the splatter room with the glow paint. The owner and staff provided excellent service. We'll definitely be back to try some of the projects.

name: Allury Arora
text: My family had the most amazing time at the Splatter room. The team here is friendly, personable and offers excellent customer service. They offer multiple choices, we will return to make more memories.

name: Krystal Hand
text: We did our daughter's 10th birthday here and it was great! Everyone had fun in the splatter room and best of all, as the parent, I actually got to enjoy the party as well since they took care of everything! Evan, the owner, was great communicating with me before the party and made sure everything was just as we wanted.  We will definitely go back for more crafting!

name: laurie burton
text: We had the best time today! We did the acrylic pouring and it was amazing. Evan was super helpful and our canvases turned out great. We will definitely be back!

name: tori watkins
text: SOOO FUN.. and endless projects to choose from. Great staff

name: Jamekia Haygood
text: My boyfriend brought me here for Mother’s Day and we had an AMAZING time! The staff was super friendly, helpful and showered us with southern hospitality. It was an overall great experience and we plan to return.

name: Madison Schneider
text: We threw a surprise bridal shower there. The owners were so helpful and hospitable. The experience was fun and our bride enjoyed herself! The drinks were yummy too. We paid $20 to bring in our own food which was a reasonable deal. The splatter room was a fun new experience!

name: CARRIE KNIGHT
text: My daughter and her friend had so much fun in the splatter room. I recommend doing it. Everyone there was very nice!

name: Kyle Conforti
text: Did the splatter room with my girls was a lot of fun will definitely come back

name: Lori Redding
text: Scheduled my daughter’s 13th birthday here. It was amazing!!!  The owner and teacher were super friendly and made sure we had a great time. Loved our string art. Relaxing. And sooo many different crafts to choose from. Highly recommend !

name: Lexii Jackson
text: This review is overdue. I brought my girlfriend here to partake in splatter painting as one of our anniversary activities. The reservation process was quick and effortless on their website. You walk in and have your temp taken, you're given a squirt of sanitizer for your hands and then you sign your waiver if you did not already complete this step online. After completing the waiver a super friendly employee directed us to a table that had been set up with a cute anniversary sign, decorations, chocolate, champagne and our blank canvas. We were then able to add designs with tape that would be peeled off post splatter painting while enjoying our glass of champagne. Once we finished our champagne, part 2 of the fun began. We were taken to the splatter paint room where we put on our protective wear over our clothes, shoe protectors and goggles. While an employee went over the basics, we were given a bluetooth speaker to play music,  they exited, turned off the lights, we blasted our music and the anniversary paint party began! You reserve the room for an hour so you can splatter till you can't splatter anymore. Once finished, one of the owners came in to grab our masterpiece to place on the table to have the tape peeled off and allow it to dry a little. We took off all protective gear, wiped what little paint got on our faces off and decided to sit at their cute bar station to have a couple margaritas and a beer. They have a decent selection of snacks and drinks. The strawberry margaritas were sooooo good. You can easily kill some time while your paint is trying to dry. My girlfriend and I got the pleasure of meeting and speaking to the owners who happen to be husband and wife. They were nothing short of a delight! Wonderful personalities, warm and welcoming. They informed us about their various craft classes that another group was doing. This particular group was making candles and they let us know what a great and fun experience they had. My girlfriend and I will certainly be back to try one of the crafts out. If you're looking for something fun and different,  come here. The owners deserve all of Bham's business! Can't wait to return. Thank you all for such an amazing experience!

name: Jesse Dabbs
text: Very fun, and the owners are really nice. Very good people. Definitely going back for more fun.

name: Brittany McCullough
text: Got to spend my birthday here and it was a PERFECT! We had a fabulous girls night trying out all different crafts. A few of us went into the splatter paint room with glow paint which I highly recommend-- we were able to play our own music too which made it such a fun experience! The staff was super friendly and accommodating and I highly recommend the experience. By the way-- did I mention that they have a beer and wine bar plus snacks?!  Alcohol always makes crafts more fun :))

name: Mindy Ellis
text: My husband and friends surprised me with a 40th birthday party here and it was SO MUCH FUN!!! The staff went all out decorating with cute and creative birthday signs and decor. They had several options for DIY projects set out to choose from....a wonderful variety of choices that catered to a wide variety of people, guys and girls. They were so helpful and patient as we worked on our projects. They also had a wide variety of drinks available. The owners were incredibly friendly and accommodating! It was a wonderful night and a special birthday! Go check them out, you will not be disappointed!!!

name: Abby Hoenstine
text: we had such a blast doing splatter painting for a bachelorette party! evan was super sweet and helpful and we enjoyed our experience so much!

name: Crystal NeVille
text: Great place to allow your creative juices to flow.  The owners are amazing.

name: Natalie
text: Had such an amazing time here! Evan and Melonie were so amazing to my group and we will definitely be back!!!

name: Kinsey Copeland
text: My friend and I went to Pinspiration to do the Splatter room and we had a blast! We got the s’mores and mimosa bucket.. it was delish! The owners of the place were so nice and helpful! Will definitely be doing this again :)

name: Janie Flores
text: Drinks & DIY, need I say more?

name: Ashley Parker
text: Phenomenal Service!

name: Jenny Stephens
text: Really fun birthday party.

name: Vickie Perez
text: Great

name: Diana Childs
text: Ok

name: Amanda Vieth
text: What a great personality. Had us laughing and the food was amazing! Great place to pick up food to go! We will be back FOR SURE!

name: Shaquilla Sewell
text: This place is great! The food came out in a decent time and the staff is very friendly. I do wish it came with soup or salad though.

name: David Smith
text: Real good they give you a lot of food

name: Jessica P
text: Picked up some delicious lunch from hibachi joe today and it was DELICIOUS! The steak was perfectly cooked and that chicken couldn’t have been flavored better! Highly recommended!

name: Kaska Howard
text: This is THE BEST Hibachi place in Dothan AL! Joe definitely knows what he is doing and on top of that he is super nice and always greets people with a smile and a little joke here and there. Its takeout only but food can be ordered ahead of time and picked up.

name: Jason Brooks (Jmb3d)
text: Lots of food and is really good for take out. I would recommend eating here. You will have enough for at least two or three meals.

name: Noelle Sternberg
text: This place has great food. Came to Texas during our worst storm in year and made meals for the lower class. We are so thankfully and blessed. God bless you

name: Lydia “laceychilds” Childs
text: Food was really awesome, a little bit pricey, but excellent food and service.

name: Jordan Lopez
text: Great food and prices. The staff is great and very nice and helpful

name: Autumn Valentine
text: Amazing food!! Worth the money for the amount of food you get. Cant wait to eat it when I move back in a few months ❤

name: Candace J
text: Lovely folks, great service, clean place and the food is absolutely amazing!

name: Jason Bush
text: Stopped in and picked up a Supreme box with steak and chicken. After eating it felt compelled to leave a 5 star review. Everyone should give this place a try, will definitely be back for more!

name: Pauline Bradley
text: Sorry but the pics you see is not what you get.  Very nice people just don't expect much food for your 15.00 bucks. I would leave a pic but it won't let me.. I leave 3 stars because they are nice..

name: Matt
text: Butterfly! 🦋 the best yumm yumm ever!

name: Andrew Byrd
text: Joe came and catered lunch for our staff and did an outstanding job! The food was great and it was an awesome experience! I would highly recommend him!

name: Jessica Motley (Jessica Motley)
text: Habachi Joe’s is ALWAYS delicious and Joe is a phenomenal man who is always so friendly and giving to everyone he meets!

name: Kaycie Riley
text: Joe is very unprofessional and rude to his stuff. Terrible don’t recommend supporting this place.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your reviews.

name: Melissa Hix
text: Great food, fast service and very friendly

name: Phyllis Dickens
text: Best Hibachi in town and one plate is enough food for two.

name: Natasha Kennedy
text: Great food when Joe is cooking.

name: Josh C
text: A little pricey but gooood food.

name: Jeffrey Phillips
text: Great food. Friendly people. No complaints what so ever.

name: Paul Enloe
text: Fantastic Hibachi-to-go! Great customer service.

name: matthew quinn
text: Excellent steak and chicken!

name: Jennifer Dunaway
text: That yumyum sauce!!

name: Trisha Bain
text: Very pricey. I got an adult lunch & a kids, the adult had a side of cabbage, besides this, the portions were about the same.

name: Jessica Johnson
text: This place is more then I expected. The food is amazing.

name: tyrone thomas
text: Food good but very over priced.

name: wes davenport
text: Very good hibachi.

name: Layvonnia Hadley
text: Excellent!! Great service,  Joe is the best !!

name: Lavada Tellis
text: The Best!!!!!

name: Kathy Youngblood
text: Love it

name: Ben and Jen
text: Completely adore this new-ish restaurant.  Wonderful ambiance and kind-hearted staff.  The food is small plates, and worth every penny.  Too notch cocktails and a small but good wine selection.  Peaceful, quaint, well appointed old building with couches and coffee tables for a relaxing evening.  Just go.  You will love it

name: Keith Jackson
text:
This place has an upscale, yet casual feel.  The decor and finishings are very nice, yet they have TVs on the wall.  The service was great.  The staff seemed helpful and friendly, and everything was clean and well organized.

The food itself was very tasty.  All the plates (while small compared to the high priced) were creative, well presented, and delicious.  This is a tapas place, meaning you should expect small amounts of food that are a little overpriced.  The stuffed mushrooms, while great, maybe leaned into this idea a little too much.

Now to the cocktails.  The PB&J drink was surprisingly one of the best cocktails I've had.  The other drinks I had were above average for the area and price.

This place is new and definitely worth a visit or two.  The location is great and easy to get to from the highway, but the parking lot is absolutely terrible.

Come here if you need a break from the 10,000 "look how unique we are" hipster breweries around town.  Would certainly go again.

name: Karen Hislop
text: Great service, great venue and great food!

name: Josh Templet
text: Great tapas!

name: kathleen dubey Davis
text: I tried there lasagna today and it was amazing! Definite go to place for catering or even family dinners you can pick up and bring home! Excited to try the other casseroles and choices in the future!

name: Jennifer Susman
text: This place is insanely good.  I'm normally not one for "lunch cafes" but I truly enjoy coming here.  Try anything off of the Clark's Kitchen menu and you will be glad you did!  The food is delicious, the restaurant is clean, service is fabulous, internet is free- what more can I say?  Love it here.  I'll be back tomorrow...again!

name: Doris Lepoma
text: I had Seafood Gumbo, It was just perfect,,,Almost like the Gumbo my husband and my mother-in law makes. It was a welcome treat foe  both me and my son. Also  perfect day to have our lunch outside/sidewalk. The pansies are beautiful.

name: Tommy Evans
text: Walked in to a decent atmosphere, pleasant enough staff, but we waited for 40 minutes for two small orders. I got half of what was ordered, my girlfriend didn't even get hers. And we wound up getting a refund and leaving. Short staffed or no they could have warned us, we wasted an entire afternoon and got nothing for it. Don't eat here. It was just bad.

name: ImUrUncleDaddy
text: Good food, ok prices, fast service, great deserts, and even have take home meals. Take home meals are great being a college student because it's enough to feed me all week. Stop by at least once a week now.

name: Destiny L
text:
I am a long time customer of Camile's, not because of the food, but because it is right next door to campus. I sometimes like to sit and grab a bite between classes. The food is bit bland, but I have never had any problems with my order. One day I did and was treated horribly for the complaint. I ordered the Camile club with no mayo. When I received my sandwich, it had mayo. So, I calmly went back up and explained that I didn't want mayo. I was told it could be fixed.

While waiting on my sandwich, I noticed the staff watching me and speaking quietly, but I ignored it. 5 minutes later I was called back and when I went to check my sandwich again, I noticed the residue from mayo. It looked as if someone had wiped the mayo off and changed the bread. Again, calmly, I went back up (once again noticing the staff snickering) and asked to speak to the manager for a refund. Said-manager whose name I couldn't get, claimed she was there the whole time they "remade" my sandwich and it was fresh. I told her that couldn't be the case because it was now cold, it took her less time to make it than originally and I showed her a piece of lettuce that had mayo in it.

She then rudely asked me if I still had my receipt, which I did. I was given a refund, but I don't appreciate the way I was treated. If I'm paying for a meal, I expect it to made the way I requested it. I didn't ask them to make me a sandwich befitting God. I just didn't want mayo.  I am never stepping foot into that cafe again.

name: donrico browne
text: Love it friendly staff and the food was delicious  prices very affordable  definitely  would dine in again!!! Worth sharing

name: C M
text: Food was fast! I got a burger, which had melty cheese, great ground beef, and crisp lettuce and tomatoe. Also got a fruit cup that was fresh! My buddy got a poboy. It looked great, had normal sized shrimp for a restaurant that is not specifically seafood. Will be back. Prices a bit high, but again it's quality food, not fast food.

name: Wes Allday
text: Good food, great people, nice atmosphere for lunch.

name: Captain Redbeard
text: Food was decent but I expected more.  I ordered a turkey habanero sandwich but there was no spicy-ness at all.

name: Devin Brown
text: Awesome Food and great people! You can't beat this place.

name: Phil Forrest
text: Very delicious simple food. Lots of healthy options.

name: Jaye J
text: I had a great experience

name: William Matthew Reichert
text: Great casseroles

name: Carley Pekelder
text: No real silverware. :(

name: Lacey Kitching
text: We had a great time. Great staff came and checked on us several times. All adults and kids had fun! Definitely recommend for parties. We will be coming back in the future.

name: Robert Pastuszka
text: Not a bad place for a little kids party. Plenty of bounce houses and other activities for them.

name: Summer Trapp
text: We had so much fun!

name: Tim Palmer
text: Nice place. Very clean

name: Monique S. Martin
text: Very nice kids enjoyed there self

name: Charles Olson
text: Great place to have a party the kids had a blast

name: Jennifer Wilson
text: It is a great place to rent out for kids birthdays parties! All the kids had a great time!! There is plenty of seating for everyone and more than enough tables for food and gifts.

name: J D
text: Great place to take smaller children. Lots of play space all indoors. Big negative there are things that need to be removed or enclosed to better safe guard kids from injury.

name: Tina Borden
text: Good place for younger kids! Bouncy houses and black lights. Pretty cool!

name: Carly Glover
text: We had a great time at the party! Loved all the inflatables . Good clean place to have a party. Always cool instead even when you are running around getting hot!

name: Allen Smith
text: Large and many inflatables. The staff was incredible.

name: Daryl Moon
text: Fun Laser tag Party.  Would recommend.

name: Catherine HEWSON
text: We have had multiple parties here kids loved it!

name: David Franklin
text: Great place for a little kids birthday party

name: Diane Glascock Burns
text: Good place

name: Steve Morgan
text: So

name: Christina Turberville
text: Shoals Event Specialist recently supplied us with tables and chairs for our prom at Muscle Shoals High School.  They did a great job and were very professional and followed through with all of our needs and details.  Thank you for taking such good care of our needs!

resp.text: Thanks Christina!! Y’all were great to work with and we look forward to working with you in the future!

name: Alexis Humphrey
text: AAAAAhhhhhmazing!!!! Sam and Lamarcus knew what to do when to do it. The music was perfect for every part of my wedding. Easy to communicate with and very responsive with email, text, & call. I will diffidently rehire for later events!

name: Deonna Mullins
text: Shoals Event Specialists served us for an outdoor baby shower recently. They did an excellent job! Sam responded within a few minutes each time I reached out! They worked with me to figure out exactly what I needed. Their prices and services are the best! I highly recommend them for all your event needs!

resp.text:
(Translated by Google) Thanks Deonna!

(Original)
Thanks Deonna!

name: Alyssa Nelson
text: Very professional. Love every thing they do. You should consider them at your next event.

resp.text: Thanks!

name: Zach Blenkinsopp
text: Talk about a great company to work with.  Thanks a lot for everything and I look forward to having a long standing relationship with you guys!

resp.text: Thanks Zach!

name: Susan G
text: We rented a tent, tables, chairs and a bar through Shoals Event Specialists this past  weekend.  The price and service were excellent!

resp.text: Thanks Susan! We had a great time and are so happy yall trusted us to handle all of these services.

name: Ruby Page
text:
I hosted a couples wedding shower and planned on around 20 to 25 people. Around 3 in the afternoon on Saturday the day before the shower which was on Sunday. I realized I had totally forgotten about tables and chairs.

I messaged Shoals Event Specialist with my fingers crossed that someone would be available to help since almost all of the other party rental places were closed on the weekend and with it being such short notice, I wasn't holding my breath.

Not only did they answer, but they were very pleasant and helped me figure out how many tables and chairs I would need and delivered everything and picked it all back up after the party.

Shoals Event Specialist truly saved the day!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Blair! It was great meeting you and your family!

name: Amber Edwards
text: I hired them as the DJ for my Wedding two weeks ago and the did not disappoint. The did set up their systems on time and every music they played was wonderful.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Amber! We love getting feedback from satisfied customers.

name: Bentley Sharp
text: These guys did a dance for my sons school. He loved it and told me how nice it was. I will definitely use them for my next event.

resp.text: Thanks Bentley!

name: Ace Eaton
text: Very professional and fun to work with. I’ve enjoyed my experience working with the guys at Shoals Event Specialists. I highly recommend them for all your DJ needs and venue needs for weddings like tents, tables, and chairs.

resp.text: Thanks Ace!

name: Nick Highfield
text: I definitely give these boys a five star rating. But don't let this distract you from the the fact that in 1966, Al Bundy scored four touchdowns in a single game while playing for the Polk High School Panthers in the 1966 city championship game versus Andrew Johnson High School, including the game-winning touchdown in the final seconds against his old nemesis, Bubba "Spare Tire" Dixon.

name: Dustin Coan
text: Very knowledgeable staff who will assist you with rentals for tables, chairs, and linens, staging, lighting, sound re-enforcement, and more!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Thomas Lindsey
text: The party yall DJ'ed that I was at was awesome! Yall did a great job!

name: Andrew Parker
text: these boys played at a Halloween party. They kept playing that fire, and I couldn’t stop dancing.

resp.text: Thanks Andrew!

name: Earthangel888
text: I've turned escape rooms into a personal hobby after my first experience in Texas a few years ago. Imagine my delight when I found one in the city of Auburn! The manager is very friendly,patient,and personable. Even though he temporarily lacks sufficient staff at the moment, he is still able to deliver a fun experience for everyone. He deserves a good staff !  Apply if you enjoy creating fun experiences for people! I plan on booking more rooms in the near future and bringing more people with me next time! My friend and I chose "Imprisoned" and I'm glad that he enjoyed his first escape room.

name: Deborah Williams
text: I had such a great time! It was a little hard but not too difficult and was super fun and satisfying, I got out with 1 minute! Our game master Dawson was great too! Coming back tomorrow!

name: DeMarcus Butler
text: Had a blast! Went with the wife and two teenager boys and took on the medium difficulty room. The puzzles required thought and a keen eye, and were extremely fun to solve. Will definitely be back to tackle one of the harder rooms. Oh yeah, we made it out in time.

name: Dimode Rhee
text:
Event started normally with the game master explaining rules, objectives, & information regarding opening locks. Throughout the game, I noticed we actually had to open the escape room door to ask if anyone was there to help us—we had multiple hints. Even received extra with beverage purchases... the hint providing service was slow. Secondly, before the game started we were informed that the room had a tough lock to open where every group struggled... understandable... we received the hint to open the tough lock but failed to open so we called for assistance. Hilariously enough, even the game master struggled to open the lock... this whole process of opening one, tough lock took approximately 15 minutes—1/4 of our game time. With the intention of completing destroying the lock and my foot on the wall, I had to pull that one lock off with all my force after the game master left. But the game master assured that the time would get frozen—cool.
Thirdly, when time was up... the game master does not hesitate to end the entire game by punching in the last code spoiling everything. There was not a single thought in the game master’s mind to ask us whether we desired just a bit more time to crack the room... Game master simply walked in, punched the code, and we all stood there awkwardly, confused, & disappointed.
We complained about the lock... their response was there was prior information given before the game—true. We recommended them to please replace it immediately
We asked if there was anything that could be done to remedy our dissatisfaction with the room and the fact we paid $200 for one hour to elapse so unfortunately. They informed us that it was up to the owner to perform refunds, but the manager informed us with a possible discount sent through our email. It’s been a week... nothing. Obviously, their customer service skills need to be reevaluated.
Was a real tragic end to a group’s Friday night honestly. We went in expecting to have fun whether we escaped or not... but we felt robbed. Hopefully future groups will not experience the extreme dissatisfaction like we did.
PSA: DON’T PICK THE VAULT ROOM.

name: amy dilmar
text: Thank you for a good time. Great customer service! Minor tweaks such as a few clues on laminated paper weren't erased from last group. Fun and enjoyable!

resp.text: Hmmm, we’ll do better!

name: jacob hootselle
text: Excellent! Very fun. Fast paced and interesting theme. We almost got through it but no cigar haha.

name: Trina Taylor
text: Auburn Escape Zone is AWESOME!!!! We traveled from Columbus, Ga to check them out. It was worth the drive. The staff is professional and respectful. I love how they engage with the customers to make sure their experience is a great one. We will definitely be going back soon.

resp.text: Thanks so much, Z!  I cherish your review and can’t wait to have you back. We need all the support we can get during this tough time, bring some friends and play again!

name: Deidra Allen
text: Was our first escape room and we had a blast today! Erin was great, will definitely be back!

name: Michelle Broome
text: We had A blast! We did The Vault with 6 of us and it was so fun!! Can’t wait to do it again!!!

name: Tanisha Scarlett Bellamy
text: Erin and Emma what a great duo. Great service, loads of fun. We will be back soon. Thank you for the great first experience!

resp.text: Wow!  We really appreciate that, Tanisha. We’d love to host you again soon. Tell a friend!

name: Drew Malinowski
text: Myself and my wife came here and we were a little anxious at first but we left having fun and ready to come back soon! This was a great COVID safe date night!

resp.text: A million thanks, Drew!  Tell everyone because we need’em right now.

name: Annie R
text: Great customer service, the room was fun, and the game master was really helpful!

name: Paul Howell
text: This was great fun. I took my 15, 13, and 11 year old kids to do the cabin. They worked together to figure out all of the clues for an entire hour and didn’t argue once, that alone was worth the price of admission. The puzzles were challenging but even the youngest was finding clues and solving the mystery. When we finished they wanted to do another room!  We didn’t that night but will definitely be back to try the next room.

resp.text: Paul, this is a great endorsement and exactly what we are looking for--disconnect from devices, connect with family/friends.  Can't wait to have y'all back for another adventure!

name: Joseph Davis
text: Very fun and challenging!! We went as a date and it was a great time!

resp.text: Many thanks Joseph. Hope you have many more dates and play all our rooms!

name: Brandon Jameson
text:
We love this place! They are doing what needs to be done re: COVID-19. The place is clean and open for business. What a great place to bring your family.
Erin is such a sweet young lady. So helpful with a great attitude.
Can’t wait to go try our luck again!
Brandon Jameson

resp.text: Many, many thanks Brandon!  We need all the help we can get spreading the word that we're open, safe and fun!

name: Blair Owens
text: Had a great time. Went in with 3 adults and a six year and 3 year old. We did the imprisoned room and found it somewhat challenging but the game master was great with the clues and tips. Would definitely do again!

resp.text: What a great group!  Be sure to try our other adventures soon. Thanks!

name: Kelsey Grant
text: This was our second time at Auburn Escape Zones. They have friendly staff and great rooms. Very clean facility and a fun way to get out while still being safe during covid-19. Will definitely be back soon!

resp.text: Can't wait to see you again soon.  Please help us spread the word, we need all the help we can get as we attempt to bounce back after the shutdown!

name: Carsten Grove
text: Difficult puzzles that were a lot of fun!

resp.text: We’ll take that. Thanks for your business. Give us a chance to earn that other star soon!

name: Kim
text: This experience was so fun! We did the prison room and it was amazing!!!! It's clean, it's suspenseful, and makes you think OUTSIDE of the box!!!! Can't wait to come back

resp.text: Great review, can't wait to see you again!

name: Deana Schrimsher
text: Both of our experiences have been amazing! Erin and Ashlyn, our game leaders were very helpful and made the experience great. Our family loves the challenge of solving the puzzles and we have made it out both times!

resp.text: Amazing!  Y'all are 2 for 2.  Hope you'll try them all!

name: Jay Hartin
text: I've done 16 escape room across 3 states, and I was pleased with my experience with Auburn Escape Zones. Online booking was a breeze and our on-site service went smoothly. We did The Vault. The room concept was original and the puzzles were fair and evenly split between the two sections. Our game master, Riley, was great. She was attentive and helpful. We look forward to coming back to try the Puzzler Room.

resp.text: Thanks, Jay.  The idea of a cooperative room is daunting to some, so glad you enjoyed it.  I appreciate hearing that our Team is performing well!

name: Nathaniel Lazard
text: I had a great experience here. I’ve gone here many times before and with this pandemic I’m really glad to know the team here is working diligently to provide safe and clean fun for everyone by increasing room sanitation and adhering by state regulation.

resp.text: Thank you Nathaniel! We work hard to make sure that all of our guests have a safe, fun experience and were so glad that you enjoyed yourself! We hope to see you back soon!

name: Sierra Jacobs
text: Their rooms are great. The people are great when I’m there, and they would get an otherwise perfect score, but everytime I call them no one ever answers the phone. There have been times where I’m literally in the middle of booking a room and at 1 min over the time I can’t book it. I tried calling to ask if it was still available, and no answers EVERY time. Even if I’m not asking about a room and just calling to ask questions, I haven’t gotten an answer. I shouldn’t have to drive there in person to talk to someone, or just book online to interact with you all.

resp.text: Hi Sierra,  as we are a 'reservations' venue we are usually not in the building when no rooms are booked.  The 1 min issue you mentioned is a feature where games are no longer bookable within 60 minutes of the start time--this protects us from someone booking the 4:00 room at 3:55 and we're not prepared--once that time has passed the room 'falls off' of the website.  As for you having trouble reaching someone we are rarely in the building during the week (unless a room is booked Wed or Thurs) and we're there answering calls during business hours Fri-Sun when it's busy.  Beyond that we check our voicemails X2 daily and respond to calls as quickly as possible.  We're so glad you enjoyed our rooms and would love to host you again, I recommend email or FB messenger if you don't reach anyone on the landline (if we're there we'll answer!).  Thanks for coming in!

name: Rachael White
text: Our staff of 17 went on day leadership retreat and Auburn Escape Zones did everything they could to make our experience awesome! We had a schedule change last min and they were able to graciously accommodate. We loved it and we all had so much fun!

resp.text: We are so glad y'all had a great time, can't wait to host you again soon!

name: MoNique Gaines-Harris
text:
If you are looking for a challenging fun-filled excursion, you will definitely find it here! We are becoming somewhat of escape room enthusiasts, and Auburn Escape Zones is currently our favorite. We are closer to Columbus, GA escape rooms, but they were booked, so we decided to take the short ride to Auburn, and it was worth it. The staff was professional and accomodating while adhering to public health guidelines pertaining to COVID-19.
We did the Cave room and will be returning to escape the Vault!

resp.text: So glad y'all made the drive MoNique!  Josh at Exodus has some great rooms as well but we'd love to have you back to try all of our challenges.  Hope you get hooked like we are!

name: Cyntell Crosby
text: really fun! staff is extremely nice! husband and i tried the cabin was hard but still fun!

resp.text: Cabin is tough with 2 players, we'd love to see you come back and bring a few more players.  The more the merrier (and better chance of escaping)!  Thanks Cyntell!

name: Teck Four
text: Erin was amazing!!! LOVE HER! 10/10 recommend

resp.text: Thanks so much, Teck.  She is pretty great.  Hope to see you again soon.

name: Sarah Ingram
text: Still open now during the pandemic and keeping the place neat and clean and giving out masks to wear!! Much needed time to get out w friends to escape being stuck at home all day!

resp.text: Glad you were able to escape with us!

name: Mike Milford
text: Super fun! Had a great time with the fam. Clean and safe, which was nice.

resp.text: YEEESSSS!  Tell a friend please!

name: James Collins
text: This is the most exciting place I have ever been to it's better than six flags ! But you have to use your noggin in order to find out don't rush!

resp.text: Boooooommmm, take that Six Flags!  Haha--we're a roller coaster of emotions!

name: edneshea williams
text: Had an amazing time s/o to guss he did great!

resp.text: Thanks EW!

name: Tyrell Jones
text: I had a blast I highly recommend everyone come out with their families it was awesome

resp.text: We really appreciate the recommendation Tyrell!

name: Leslie F
text: Super fun team building! Everything thoroughly sanitized!

resp.text: A million thanks, Leslie!

name: Wifiproblems
text: Really fun!!! Jordan and gus did great

resp.text: Yes, they're amazing!!!

name: Riley Anna
text: Staff was super chill and the room was super fun!

resp.text: Thanks Riley!

name: Steven Dixon
text: I've been to Auburn Escape Zones twice with friend and we have absolutely loved it. If you're looking for a fun challenge, I would highly recommend checking this place out!

resp.text: Right on, Steven.  We appreciate it!

name: Stephanie Yuhas
text:
Came from NC with the family to visit my son who recently moved to Auburn area for college. We wanted a family activity we had never done before. We googled family things to do in area and Auburn Escape Rooms came up. We booked the cabin escape room for 6 of us. We ESCAPED with 7 seconds remaining! We absolutely loved it. We now are gonna make it a family thing for us to do each time we come to visit our son! Highly reccommended!!!! The staff was amazing and so friendly and it was set up i side the building so nice and clean!! Thanks so much!
THE MCKAY FAMILY

resp.text: Amazing!  Talk about edge-of-your-seat!  So glad y'all found us, we can't wait to see you again.

name: jason helms
text: Fun time set up well challenging clues we didn’t escape so we’ll definitely be back. Great activity.

resp.text: Thanks a million, Jason.

name: Kim Golden
text: So much fun! It was a great way to spend an hour. I did a room with my husband and we really enjoyed the challenge. The staff was super friendly, too. Great value for your time and money!

resp.text: Better late than never--thanks Kim!

name: Todd Scholl
text: Great time for my sales team from The Hotel at Auburn University!!!  We had several rooms and think it was so valuable want to return when they get their "racing rooms" ready so we can get competitive between departments.  Definitely need at least 3 people but 5 was a great number in our room.  We will be back and refer them for team building fun to our clients!

resp.text: Todd aka Tony, what a great group you brought.  It was so much fun having you guys escape with us.  Can't wait for you all to come back.  Thanks for passing our name along to people who stay at the hotel!  Make sure you tell them to tell us that Todd sent them!

name: Andrew Smith
text: Myself and members of our group loved Escape Zones! We met Dave, one of the owners, on the first night and had such a great time that we came back the next day. The puzzles were challenging but fun and the stories behind the rooms were great. We loved knowing that the owners came up with the ideas themselves and that it was not part of a franchise. I recommend visiting Escape Zones in Auburn!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words. Your group was a lot of fun and we hope you guys slay Blackbeard!

name: Miles Parker
text: Staff was friendly and very punctual. We did the Imprisonment challenge, and it was a blast! Puzzles were challenging, but not impossible. Price is pretty good too. I'm excited to doing my next one, and I highly recommend Escape Zone to anyone looking for something fun to do.

resp.text: Miles, we enjoyed having you and Kittye out tonight!  Very impressed at how well you guys did.  Hope you bring your brother and friends with you next time!  Happy Valentines!

name: Abigail Starns
text: One of the better ones we've been too

resp.text: Love that endorsement, Abigail!  Hope we can have you back for our other adventures soon.

name: Lakisha Haynes
text: If you haven't been, go! We went with a group of people and it was both challenging and fun. We had an awesome time. All of the staff members were super nice and energetic/outstanding!

resp.text: Loved you guys coming out!  Such a fun group!

name: Laura Runion
text: Unfortunately I can't give this zero stars! I booked online and, we got there early. We were told there was another group in the room we had booked. We waited half an hour then were asked to follow a girl to the back where we were told they had "double booked" The room. They offered us  us another room, one not as difficult but didn't offer to comp it! We did ultimately take a refund but left really, really unhappy. We won't be back. There's another place in Moore's Mill!

resp.text: Laura, I'm so sorry for the experience you had at our business.  Having messaged with you personally I feel that we've resolved the issue as best as possible.  We are a family-owned small business that thrives on word-of-mouth advertising.  I don't want to make excuses as to why this scenario unfolded the way it did, only want to convey my sincerest apologies for the perfect storm of bad timing that your group walked in to (city sewer system was backing up into our bathroom, manager was out of the building dealing with that issue, newer employee didn't recognize that there were 2 groups booked for that time slot).  As a fellow SBO you know that there are occasionally times when all the holes in the cheese line up and things happen.  We do everything we can to mitigate these events but this time we failed you and feel terrible.  --Shawn

name: Holly Batal
text: Great way to spend an afternoon. Older kids loved it!

resp.text: Many thanks for the kind words, Holly.  We'd love to host you again soon!

name: Sean Cornelius
text: PHENOMENAL experience. They packaged AMAZING value while being super affordable. Some places charge as much as double. I'm not saying thoses places are not good....I'm saying we really enjoyed ourselves here. Meeting the owners and getting to know them and their story added to the value of the experience. I would recommend this place and we're for sure going back to beat the other rooms.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words. We really enjoyed having you guys here and can't wait for you to come back.

name: Brittany Israel
text: I wanted to experience something new with my family as a big birthday celebration. This was the perfect outting for us as we are very competitive and love to solve puzzles and riddles. We chose the Cabin as our escape room and had the best time. The puzzles are all intriguing and require a little bit of focus and memory, but with some teamwork and brainstorming we were able to make it out just in time. We will definitely be back to try the other rooms soon, I can't say enough about Auburn Escape Zones. Thank you for making my birthday a day to remember!

resp.text: We are so thankful you chose us to celebrate with.  Hopefully fun memories were made.  Come back soon!

name: Tracy Brunson
text: My family had the opportunity to make a memory that will last forever thanks to the kind people at Auburn Escape Zone. They graciously incorporated a surprise engagement proposal from our future son-in-law to our daughter. We did the  Black Beard's Brig which was exciting and very challenging. It required teamwork from the whole family. This was an awesome experience that everyone should try.

resp.text: Tracy we loved being a part of such a special evening.  It was humbling sharing this moment with you all. Blessings on you and your family.

name: David Moore
text: Had a great time with my wife and kids! Just needed 5 more minutes!!!

resp.text: So glad y’all came in to play. Escape Rooms are a learned skill, the more you play the better you’ll do. Hope to see you again!

name: Kaylee Wynn
text: This was my family's first experience with an escape room. We were trying to find something to do with my kid brother and we were not sure what we were expecting when we pulled up, but we ended up having a blast! The employees are very friendly and helped made the experience more enjoyable! I recommend it!

resp.text: Kaylee we enjoyed meeting you and your family.  We pray you have a wonderful Easter and come back to do all our rooms!

name: Leadership Lee County
text: We took a large group (34 people) to Auburn Escape Zones and they were very accommodating. It is the best place for a corporate team building experience! Just let them know what you need and they will go out of their way to accommodate! Thanks for letting Leadership Lee County "Escape Auburn"! We had a blast!

resp.text: We've just hosted you again almost 3 years later.  So thankful for our loyal customer base!

name: Crystal Green
text: Had a blast in the cabin room!  The staff was great and very accommodating for our group. Exciting challenge that definitely put our brains to work and proved to be a great team builder activity for us.  So glad we were able to experience this awesomeness!

resp.text: So glad we were able to provide a fun and challenging experience.  Dig deep and find that inner superhero and come back to do that room!

name: Melissa Rohling
text: We had a great team-building experience with out staff!  We had 2 groups break out of their rooms and then we had lunch brought in for our staff meeting.  Everyone had a great time and we all learned a little more about each other :)

resp.text: Can't wait for you guys to come back!

name: Grant Gravitt
text: The staff was friendly and the rooms were well-decorated and immersive. Our group of 4 very much enjoyed themselves and had lots of laughs trying to get through the puzzles. Will definitely visit again when I get the chance.

resp.text: Many thanks Grant!

name: Tara Harbison
text: We had a FANTASTIC time at Auburn Escape Zones!  Our sales team utilized AEZ as a fun team building activity and we more than happy with the outcome. We broke out into two different teams, and since we are competitive, it was definitely a race to see which team could "escape" first. I have personally recommended this place to several clients who are looking to entertain out of town guests with a fun outing.  Great addition to the Lee County Area!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words.  Come back soon.

name: venus9 Cotton
text: Good customer service

resp.text: Thank you! We pride ourselves on excellent customer service. Be sure to tell your friends about us, & we hope to see you soon!

name: Janet Merchant
text:
I went with my family and a friend for my nephew's birthday. We did "Imprisoned". I cannot give enough stars! The staff were so friendly, and it was a very fun atmosphere.
A great time was had by all!!  So glad we have this in Auburn!!

resp.text: We're thrilled to be serving the A/O area and are thankful for customers like you.  Please come again!

name: AHS DECA
text:
The AHS entrepreneurship class visited  Escape Zones , here is what a couple of  my  students said:

Escape zone offered us a way to connect as a team for our tiger cage. Solving problems under stress allowed us to gauge each other’s strengths and test our team compatibility. This experience was crucial for the future of our Entrepreneurship teams.

It was really fun, I'd go again!

I thought that Escape Zones was really fun. It was interesting to work together with people who thought differently from me to try and solve the room. It was an enjoyable experience.

Escape Zones is a pretty fun place to go if you were looking to work with people together as a team and it would have been more fun if we got out!!!!!!!!

I thought it was great. It was challenging in a good way!!!

This was a blast.  It was very good for me to build connections and work with a group. It taught me that depending on fellow group members isn't a bad thing and to completely succeed it requires trust and reliance on one another.

resp.text: We enjoyed having your group out!  What an impressive and well behaved group of young people.  We hope to have future classes come out.  Thank you for your kind remarks?

name: Brent Carpenter
text: What a great experience!  I had the day of the appointment wrong and showed up and no one was there so I called.  One of the owners met us there within 15 minutes.  My daughter, wife, and I had a great time and will do it again!

resp.text: Brent we appreciate your business.  Please come again soon and try out our new rooms!

name: Brittany Edwards
text: Did the cabin. Me and my partner have done a lot of rooms. We did not escape but we both agreed this room was amazing. I do not suggest this for groups smaller than four as it’s challenging and has a lot clues. However the room was amazing looking and the clues were clever and everything went with the story line. Only thing I would have done different is waited until I had a bigger group to do it. They are super friendly and it’s not like any other rooms I have ever seen

resp.text: We appreciate that feedback, Brittany.  So glad you found our room unique and challenging.

name: Will Daniel
text: Great time and great karaoke

resp.text: Thanks for the stars, Will, but this may not be the right place?  No karaoke here, yet...

name: Keandra Baker
text: We didn’t escape but it was so much fun!!!

resp.text: Thanks KB, glad you came in!

name: Ayanna Thomas
text: I went to Auburn Escape Zones for a work team building exercise! I enjoyed working together as a team to find and piece together clues to finish the assigned task. The staff was very professional and offered to be of any assistance before and during the game.

resp.text: We enjoyed your team coming!  What a great group.  Hope you come escape with us again!!

name: Marlena Gillis
text: Our team had the pleasure of going through a room recently. It was so much fun work together as a team and learning about each other's strengths. Staff was friendly and helpful! We are looking forward to going back and trying another room!

resp.text: Loved having your group.  Come back with your family or friends soon!

name: June Milford
text: super fun challenge

resp.text: So glad y'all came in--see you again soon we hope!

name: Taco Master1334
text: I've been meaning to leave a review for these guys for a couple of weeks now, sorry! But I wanted to say these guys were amazing! I used to them to propose to my now finacée and the workers were extremely helpful with everything! They helped me choose which room and where to do it at. They were extremely perfessional and didn't give anything away when it came for me to ask, so she was totally suprised. The room was challenging for her but also a lot of fun! I would highly recommend you use them!

resp.text: That's awesome!  We're so happy to have been a small part of your big day.

name: Mary Isbell
text: Great Experience! We escaped and had so much doing it! The staff is very friendly and made the experience unforgettable! We WILL be back to do the other rooms!

resp.text: Loved having you guys here. Can't wait for you to do the other rooms.

name: Hannah Wright
text: This is the coolest place.  So fun and challenging!  You will want to do all the rooms.

resp.text: Thanks a million, Hannah.  Your opinion means a lot to us.  Hope you'll find your way in to try The Vault.

name: Kirkland Floyd
text: Auburn Escape Zones is by far one of the best things to ever come to town. The experience was challenging, thrilling, and boggled my mind.

resp.text: Kirkland so glad you and tHE  gANG could cone.Hope you come back soon!

name: Heather Johnson
text: Great fun for the entire family! Would absolutely visit again!

resp.text: We hope you will, new rooms available now!

name: Joice Milare
text: We had a Team Building outing at Auburn Escape Zones and had the most fun time! Highly recommended!

resp.text: We enjoyed your team coming!  What a great group.  Hope you come escape with us again!!

name: Mark Summerford
text: I took our office staff to The Escape Zone as a "team-building/get out of the office for some fun" event, and it did not disappoint.  Everyone had a great time, and we all want to come back and try to escape again.

resp.text: Thanks Mark for the kind words!  Glad your group had a good time.  Can't wait for you to come escape with us again!

name: Fenton Hughes
text: Really fun group activity. We did three challenges in one weekend! Very kind staff.

resp.text: Fenton we enjoyed having you all to AUEZ!  Fun seeing you all get better and better with each room.  Have a safe trip back to Utah!  Come see us next time you are in town.

name: Jessica Hopper
text: Good clean fun. Staff if very friendly. Will be coming back and referring a friend.

resp.text: Many thanks, we'd love to host you again soon.

name: Elizabeth Lundey
text: Great experience for my high school juniors and seniors!

resp.text: Such a great group.  We enjoyed having the Ambassadors escape with us.  Come back soon.

name: Anthony P.
text: Visited these guys today. Had the Willis Burger and Truffle fries, wow, delicious. Highly recommend this place. Best tasting lunch from a truck you will ever have.

name: Stu F
text: I enjoy everything shindigs has to offer. The people are always friendly and helpful. The entire menu is delicious, from the truffle fries to the catfish bou rolls. Thanks for all the great food.

name: Kay Roney
text: Attended a party catered by Shindigs.  Over the top.  The most creative and delicious appetizers and cocktails and a superbly prepared meal!

name: Courtney Harkness
text: Tried asking for a quote to cater a small party (150-200 people) and just told us they weren't interested in helping...

name: Carrie Rollwagen
text:
Shindigs is incredible. I normally get a burger and truffle fries because they're so delicious, but I've also had other things on the menu, including salad, and everything I had showed a really good balance of flavors and was really unique. This is the kind of food that is where cravings come from -- I've been known to leave my desk during an incredibly busy day at work just because I saw Shindigs tweet their menu.

Shindigs is a food truck, but they do provide everything you'll need to enjoy your meal: napkins, flatware, drinks, and a picnic table. (You may want to scout out more seating if the table is full, of course.)

They also do a fantastic job at catering -- I've been known to sneak more than a couple mini grilled cheese sandwiches off of caterer trays when they weren't looking just to have one more bite. I'm not proud of this, but it's just that good.

name: Alex
text: While I didn't enjoy the meal I got from their food truck (I belive their cook just got a bit heavy handed with the salt), I did enjoy the quick and efficient customer service I got once I wrote a review to them. The company apologized and returned my money. I would definitely try it again. I believe the nachos would have been delicious had it not been for the extra saltiness.

resp.text:
Thank you, again, for your constructive criticism!!! We would LOVE to see you again soon!!!
-The Shindigs Crew

name: Glen White
text: Great menu choices

name: Matt Johnson
text: Ran into this gem at Railroad Park.

name: Robbie Christmas
text: Wow. Amazing! We put this together for my girlfriend's birthday and it couldn't have gone any better. I loved everything about this. My girlfriend and the rest of us were literally giggling the whole time. Brandon is your guy you need as your host. He was fun, in character and patient. We truly had an amazing time. We will definitely be signing up for their future  mysteries.

name: Erica Pollock
text: Had a surprise birthday party! Case was very interactive and created a cleaver and fun storyline! If you like solving mysteries and want to have a great time with friends, I would highly recommend!  A Great way to have a birthday party that was safe and virtual.

name: S M
text: This was so so fun!!! There were lots of creative clues and the process really draws you in - even for shy or nervous folks, you get lots of information and support along the way to participate without feeling overwhelmed. It's so well designed. If you're wondering if you should do this, definitely hesitate no longer. You'll have a blast. I definitely recommend Brandon if you want to request someone in particular to lead - he was so much fun and really made the experience special and personalized!

name: Natalie
text: Detective Tom hosted my birthday zoom murder mystery. He was great at wrangling 12 drinking, snarky friends through the murder mystery and his persona was a ton of fun. We had such a great time that he graciously left zoom up for an hour afterward so our friend group could continue with the laughter and fun for a bit longer. The next day, we felt like we had been at an awesome party the night before even though none of us left our homes. This was such a unique quarantine experience.

name: Nick Dynin
text: Absolutely amazing time! Troy Murray absolutely killed it - his comedic timing, poise (we were VERY late), and audience involvement was second to none. Looking forward to trying out all of the other murder mysteries!!

name: amber Howen
text: Thank you very much for an Awesome murder mystery game. Having my family be able to have a get together, and have a ton of fun was great. Our Detective Ness host was a ton of fun! I would recommend them for any function. Thanks again!

name: Chris Fulton
text: Our team had a virtual murder mystery event.  It was very well played, entertaining and fun!  We had a great time and it was well worth the time invested.

name: Melissa Willman
text: Had an awesome time on our Zoom Murder Mystery with Jade.  She was an awesome host.  The company had everything planned out perfectly and the communication was amazing.  All of our guests were able to participate with ease and everyone had a great time.  If you're considering this, do it!

name: Martina Kopel
text: The Murder Mystery was Great! I was very nervous being Charity Case but Detective Ness helped me through it. Troy was Great. He made me feel confident. Our family is up for all the Mysteries. Thank you all who made my Christmas Present so much fun.

name: Tam Kenon
text: This was so much fun!!! I love the way you guys put this together as a virtual event. It flowed really well and Detective P. Ness did a great job guiding us as characters.

name: Vineet Kuroodi
text: Allison was awesome! She walked us through everything while staying in character the whole time! This was a really fun and covid-friendly work activity, but I can see myself playing again with friends and family.

name: Erin Mayhood
text: Jade created a fabulous experience for our family. A perfect event to bring our family together over zoom. We had kids involved (age 11 and up) and grandparents and everybody participated and had an amazing time!

name: Frances D
text: So much fun with Detective Ness/Katie! We used this as a birthday celebration for family distributed across the country and everything worked great. Best Zoom party ever!

name: Edward Kopel
text: Very fun and engaging.  The host was patient and helpful and led with humor to bring all participants into the flow of the game.  It was a challenge to decipher the clues and solve the mystery, but fun all the same.

name: Pauline “Plinerd” D
text: Renee Maria was great. We had a couple times where we needed to catch up on info and she seamlessly filled the time. Instructions were clear, enough information was given to make the crime something you could actually solve, multiple types of media (reading, videos, Zoom) kept things shakin'. Considering doing this for teen's birthday remote party. Thank you so much for a great first experience!

name: elizabeth george
text: Renee Maria did an amazing job at the murder mystery night. I had so much fun trying to solve a murder I felt like a true detective and would DEFINITELY do it again! I would like to try the Harry Potter themed one and all of then please!! I solved the murder and felt like a pro detective. Sadly I did not win best dressed but I played Irma Gerd and dressed up it was a blast! Thank you Renee Maria for making it feel so real and fun her acting was on point. I don't know who the conductor was because he left early on but he had hilarious jokes and puns at the beginning too it was cool.

name: Steve MacKessy
text: Tom was great   A really fantastic time. It was well organized and a lot of fun. A great pandemic activity.

name: Kevin Jacobsen
text: Tons of fun!  The host did a great job staying in character and getting everyone involved.  Looking forward to the next one!

name: Claudia Jordan
text: What a fun night! Renee Maria was our detective and gave us a great and memorable experience! Highly recommend!

name: Hannah Smith
text: My workplace did a virtual Zoom murder mystery and it was a blast. Case was our detective and did a phenomenal job. Definitely would recommend.

name: rachel livingston
text: This was so much fun!  Our detective was fantastic and moved everything along wonderfully!  I recommend!

name: Robin Smith
text: Our murder mystery was so fun and our host was so patient!! Loved it all. Would do again

name: Vanessa Layne
text: Great experience.  We had a blast.  Please make more! We've done them all!

name: Pat Sprehe
text: We did a Murder Mystery via Zoom (late COVID) as a company social event.  We did the Polar Express (in April; go figure) got Eric and it was a really great time.

name: Alex Bachari
text: Danielle was super fun. Great time. Make sure you get a group with people who are down to dress up and be silly.

name: Keith McBain
text:
Detective Perry kept this night of murder and mystery entertaining and fun!
Thank you for keeping the night on track to solve the crime!
It was a blast!

name: Wyatt Kincaid
text: Super fun! Detective Perry did a great job and made the experience very interactive.

name: Hunter Via
text: Great night! So much fun to be with our friends again and our host made it a lot of fun!

name: Shawna Garcia
text: We had a blast! Felicia was a terrific host and this was a great team building event

name: Sarah Fuller
text: Detective Tom was fantastic and made the evening super fun. I loved it!

name: Matt Gavitt
text: Alison and Lucy were great, we did this as a birthday party for my daughter and we all had fun dressing up and getting into character

name: Emily Rice
text: A great company! Rebecca did great as Detective Ness, and it was a great time!

name: Christine Serio-Shively
text: We had such a blast! Eric--the detective--did an awesome job and it was all so much fun to role playing and trying to figure out a murder mystery!

name: Amanda Christensen
text: Our hostess was fabulous! We all had a blast - highly recommend.

name: Emily Carlson
text: This was SO much fun! Honestly, it was such a break during quarantine. Definitely recommend.

name: Ryan Pellegrino
text: Troy Murray was fantastic - did a great job w/ our murder mystery

name: Aaron Kopel
text: Christmas gift that we played with 8 person group, and had a lot of fun with our guide Troy Murray!

name: Allegra Hollenbeck
text: This was such a fun time. The host was fantastic and kept everything on track.

name: David Butchart
text: Renee did a great job.  We had a lot of fun!

name: Stefanie Dion Jones
text: Thank you - I would totally redo this again now that I get how it works. The detective was great.

name: Mykenzie
text: Renee Maria was very enthusiastic and took the time to explain things to us. Very thankful

name: S0MEB0DY4Y0U
text: this was amazing! this was so fun! best murder mystery ive ever done!

name: RookBoomer
text: Troy was great dealing with tech issues at the start and keeping the energy high throughout. Great way to fight the Covid fatigue.

name: Samantha Ramos
text: This was such a fun experience to do with our small start up company!

name: Andrea Stone
text: Det Casper Ness Was great! He kept our team laughing and engaged throughout the event! Thank you so much!!!

name: Hannah Watts
text: that was a great time! Atlie was wonderful and kept up with all of our antics!

name: Amy Johanek
text: Super fun night with Detective Renee Ness -- definitely  something different and fun!

name: Che Williams
text: Renee Maria and Veronica Tinsley made sure we had a great time

name: Sophie Sanguedolce
text: Case was incredible!!! Such an amazing event, our team loved it.

name: Heather Mae
text: Jade did an awesome job making our party a great time

name: Minyi Tang
text: Veronica Tinsley is really helpful and the whole process is very fun.

name: Paul Pesa
text:
Great time!!!!!
Tired of your miserable zoom happy hours?...... try something different.  This was a lot of fun

name: AJ
text: HAd a fun night with my college and it was a funtime

name: Larry Thomas
text: The host was fun and it involved everyone.  Not knowing who did it made it fun until the end.

name: Michael Carajohn
text: Shane was great! A lot of fun.

name: Tyler Pushard
text: Our Host Tom was great! He added a lot of humor to the investigation which made the experience 10x better!

name: Michael Gray
text: Great fun! A challenging murder mystery!

name: Doug Kyle
text: Robert did a great job hosting our murder mystery problem.

name: Chaiya
text: This was so much fun! Thanks for making a pandemic birthday party something special!

name: Megan Weldon
text: Deya was great! So much fun!

name: Andrew Staniforth
text: Shane was awesome! So much fun!

name: Aoma Caldwell
text: Detective Zoe's energy was perfect!

name: Tayla Vincent
text: Had a great night with Allison and Lucy!

name: Harrison Mebane

name: Makayla Cofer
text: It a very affordable and my son had an awesome party!

name: Alexis Edwards
text: Went rented for my daughters 3rd Birthday! All of the kids had a blast. They came early and set it up. They were very nice and talked me through it. I called the day before and had no problems or complaints! Would highly recommend and would deffently use in the future.

name: Britnie Mickle
text: Great prices and customer service! I've rented 3 or 4 slides from them and have never had a problem!

name: Chantelle Rogers
text: Great customer service and we love the pickup and return option.

name: Zac Burks
text: Great price, great customer service, great experience!

name: jesamy Bennett
text: It was fun

name: Jamie Sullivan
text: Nice people  very helpful

name: Amanda Brown
text: Called about renting a bounce house and dunk booth. Lady tells me they have them and she will give me a call back into confirm availability. I never heard anything back, left multiple messages, nothing. Drove by and they were shut down less than a week later.

name: Kim Baker
text: We had a grest time.Great customer service. Ice cream and iced coffee, very good.

name: Ashley Brishke
text: Had a birthday party here and the kids and adults both loved it! Super cute place!

resp.text: Awww, thank you!  Parties are our favorites. Thank you for using Pinspiration for such a special time.

name: Thomas H. Moore
text: A place to relax, create and have fun.

name: T MK
text: Its something different and so fun! We had 8 girls with us and we all had a blast and cannot wait to go back.

resp.text: We’re so glad you enjoyed your time. We can’t wait to see you again. 🙂

name: Monica
text: I love Hammer and Stain we had a great girls day!   I have made several things and can't wait for next time!    I highly recommend Hammer and Stain for a fun girls event!

resp.text: We enjoyed having Y’all in the studio!

name: Melise Harris
text: Best Girls Night Out activity. Super fun and I loved the sign I made. High quality and very interactive.

name: Erika McDonald
text: I've done two workshops here and they've both be great. High quality materials and creative designs!

resp.text: We appreciate your kind words Erika!

name: Shannon Price
text: Fun place for office parties or any get together. Great instructors and fun crafts! All our projects turned out great.

name: Jacquie Caron
text: Very nice studio with helpful friendly staff. Had a great time creating.

name: Frog Price
text:
Excellent instruction along with a huge selection of projects for families, friends, coworkers. A wonderful for afternoon for kids or adults to work together.
An excellent Santa was there last Saturday.

name: Cherish Stottlemyer
text: Fantastic atmosphere, idea and fun! Extremely simple to learn from an unexperienced individual.

name: Susan Phillips
text: Had fun, met a new friend, learned so much!

text: Fun

name: Milvia Forney
text: Sarah is a rockstar! This was my first time working with Sarah, and she nailed it. She is easy to work with, and was always two steps ahead in planning and seeing my vision for the party. Simply amazing. Kudos for Sarah for making my little girl's experience an unforgettable experience.

name: Kim McElderry
text: Awesome, caring staff and fun play area. They offer classes and birthday parties, open play, and drop-off.

name: cortney Stanfield
text: Wonderful place for the little ones
